mapper.select: SELECT user_point, user_nick FROM ( SELECT user_point, user_nick FROM zuser ORDER BY user_point DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 10
SELECT notice_no, notice_title FROM ( SELECT notice_no, notice_title FROM znotice ORDER BY notice_date DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 6

SELECT sub.c, sub.ask_no, u.user_nick, a.ask_title, a.ask_date, v.vote_end, f.file_stored FROM zvote v, zask a, zitem i, zfile f, zuser u, ( select ask_no, count(vote_state) c from zvote group by ask_no order by c desc ) sub WHERE 1=1 AND v.user_no = a.user_no AND v.ask_no = a.ask_no AND a.user_no = u.user_no AND a.product_no = i.item_no AND a.user_no = i.user_no AND i.user_no = u.user_no AND i.file_no = f.file_no AND sub.ask_no = a.ask_no AND ROWNUM <= 6
AND TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'MM') = TO_CHAR(v.vote_end, 'MM') ORDER BY sub.c DESC

SELECT TO_CHAR(v.vote_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD') vote_end, i.item_name, i.item_price FROM zvote v, zask a, zitem i, zfile f, zuser u WHERE 1=1 AND v.user_no = a.user_no AND v.user_no = u.user_no AND v.ask_no = a.ask_no AND a.product_no = i.item_no AND a.user_no = u.user_no AND i.user_no = u.user_no AND i.file_no = f.file_no AND i.user_no = #{userNo } AND TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'MM') = TO_CHAR(v.vote_end, 'MM') AND i.item_status = 'y' ORDER BY v.vote_end DESC
